A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Holy\, I LOVED this movie!!!  It certainly had moments that were awe inspiring.  One of the plot lines was a bit dim\, but the main story was great.  There is also one moment (which I will not spoil) that made me so happy to see that I shed a small tear of joy.  I can't wait to see where episode IX goes with this.  For now though\, do yourself a favor and go see this one!
